results.code:
112         # Query to get total downloads for the package, excluding CI/CD systems
113         query = f"""
114             SELECT COUNT(*) as total_downloads
115             FROM `bigquery-public-data.pypi.file_downloads`
116             WHERE file.project = '{package_name}'
117             AND NOT (
118                 -- Exclude common CI/CD systems based on installer name patterns
119                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%github%' OR
120                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%travis%' OR
121                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%circle%' OR
122                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%jenkins%' OR
123                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%gitlab%' OR
124                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%azure%' OR
125                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%ci%' OR
126                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%cd%' OR
127                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%bot%' OR
128                 LOWER(details.installer.name) LIKE '%build%'
129             )
130         """
131
results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.
